## ContractEvents.removeEventListener() method

Remove an event listener from this contract

## Example

```javascript
contract.events.removeEventListener("TokensMinted", (event) => {
  console.log(event);
});
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
removeEventListener(eventName: keyof TContract["filters"] | (string & {}), listener: providers.Listener): void;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                  | Description                               |
| --------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------- |
| eventName | keyof TContract\["filters"\] &#124; (string &amp; {}) | the event name as defined in the contract |
| listener  | providers.Listener                                    | the listener to unregister                |

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

Remove a listener that was added with addEventListener
